typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Order as string,
		Client as string,
		Visit as string,
		Site as string,
		{Premises Name} as string,
		Address1 as string,
		Address2 as string,
		Address3 as string,
		City as string,
		{Post Code} as string,
		{Item to order} as string,
		{Actual Visit Date} as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		{Actual Visit Time} as timestamp 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss',
		{AM / PM} as string,
		{Pass-Fail} as string,
		{Pass-Fail2} as string,
		{Abort Reason} as string,
		{Extra Site 1} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'excel',
	container: 'audits',
	fileName: '3 year data v3.xlsx',
	sheetName: '3 year data v1',
	firstRowAsHeader: true) ~> InputExcel
source(output(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Clients
Clients select(mapColumn(
		exsisting_id = id,
		legacy_id
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> LegacyClientIds
InputExcel aggregate(groupBy(Client),
	name = max(Client),
		id = max(Client)) ~> ImportedClients
ImportedClients derive(status = 'active') ~> AddConstantColumns
AddConstantColumns sink(input(
		id as string,
		internal_id as string,
		legacy_id as string,
		name as string,
		logo as string,
		footer as string,
		client_type as string,
		sage_reference as string,
		manager_id as string,
		contract_expiry as string,
		store_locator as string,
		status as string,
		created_at as string,
		modified_at as string,
		org_level1_name as string,
		org_level2_name as string,
		org_level3_name as string,
		org_level4_name as string,
		entity_source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
